trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""> </xref> element i XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: This class represents the `<EncryptedKey>` element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen representerer den `<EncryptedKey>` element i XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptedKey>` element is used to send encryption keys.
trans-unit.target: Den `<EncryptedKey>` elementet brukes til å sende krypteringsnøkler.

trans-unit.source: It can be created in a stand-alone XML document, be placed within an application document, or be inside an `<EncryptedData>` element as a child of a `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: Det kan opprettes i en frittstående XML-dokumentet, plasseres i en applikasjon dokumentet, eller være i en `<EncryptedData>` elementet som en underordnet av en `<KeyInfo>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: The key value is always encrypted to the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelverdien krypteres alltid til mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: When `<EncryptedKey>` is decrypted, the resulting key is made available to the `<EncryptionMethod>` algorithm without any additional processing.
trans-unit.target: Når `<EncryptedKey>` er dekrypteres, nøkkelen gjøres tilgjengelig for den `<EncryptionMethod>` algoritmen uten noen ytterligere behandling.

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptedKey>` element is similar to the `<EncryptedData>` element of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class except that the data encrypted is always a key value.
trans-unit.target: Den `<EncryptedKey>` elementet er lik den `<EncryptedData>` element av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>klasse bortsett fra at data som er kryptert er alltid nøkkelverdien.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>klassen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>

trans-unit.source: For more information on XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing document at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om XML-krypteringsstandarder, kan du se XML-kryptering syntaksen og all behandling dokumentet på http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<DataReference> " name="<DataReference> " href=""></xref>element to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref uid="langword_csharp_<DataReference> " name="<DataReference> " href=""> </xref>elementet som den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""> </xref> elementet.

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A> property of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden legger til en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>objekt i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>

trans-unit.source: The `<DataReference>` element points to encrypted data that was encrypted using the key specified in the `<EncryptedKey>` element.
trans-unit.target: Den `<DataReference>` elementet peker til krypterte data som ble kryptert ved hjelp av nøkkelen som er angitt i den `<EncryptedKey>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> object to add to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"> </xref> objektet til å legge til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyReference> " name="<KeyReference> " href=""></xref>element to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyReference> " name="<KeyReference> " href=""> </xref>elementet som den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""> </xref> elementet.

trans-unit.source: This method adds A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A> property of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden legger til en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>objekt i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>

trans-unit.source: The `<KeyReference>` element points to an encrypted key that was encrypted using the key specified in the `<EncryptedKey>` element.
trans-unit.target: Den `<KeyReference>` elementet peker til en kryptert nøkkel som ble kryptert ved hjelp av nøkkelen som er angitt i den `<EncryptedKey>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to add to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"> </xref> objektet til å legge til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the optional <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CarriedKeyName>" name="<CarriedKeyName>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den valgfrie <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CarriedKeyName>" name="<CarriedKeyName>" href=""> </xref> element i XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: The `<CarriedKeyName>` element is an optional element that associates a user-readable name with a key value.
trans-unit.target: Den `<CarriedKeyName>` elementet er et valgfritt element som knytter lesbare navn nøkkelverdien.

trans-unit.source: This name can then be used to reference the key using the `<KeyName>` element within the `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: Dette navnet kan deretter brukes til å referere til nøkkelen bruker den `<KeyName>` elementet i den `<KeyInfo>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: The same `<CarriedKeyName>` element value, unlike an ID value, can occur multiple times within a single document.
trans-unit.target: Den samme `<CarriedKeyName>` elementverdi, i motsetning til ID-verdien, kan oppstå flere ganger i et enkelt dokument.

trans-unit.source: The value of the key must be the same in all `<EncryptedKey>` elements identified with the same `<CarriedKeyName>` name within an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for nøkkelen må være lik i alle `<EncryptedKey>` elementer med samme `<CarriedKeyName>` navnet i et XML-dokument.

trans-unit.source: Note that because white space is significant in the value of the `<KeyName>` element, white space is also significant in the value of the `<CarriedKeyName>` element.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at fordi mellomrom betydelige i verdien for den `<KeyName>` elementet mellomrom er også viktig i verdien for den `<CarriedKeyName>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a name for the key value.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer et navn for nøkkelverdien.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer XML-representasjon av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to output the `<EncryptedKey>` element in XML.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å sende den `<EncryptedKey>` element i XML.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> som representerer den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""> </xref> element i XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified XML information into the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn den angitte XML-informasjonen til den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""> </xref> element i XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to load an existing XML element into the `<EncryptedKey>` element represented by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å laste inn en eksisterende XML-elementet i den `<EncryptedKey>` elementet representert av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> representing an XML element to use for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> som representerer en XML-elementet skal brukes for det <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""> </xref> elementet.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The value parameter does not contain a element.
trans-unit.target: Den value parameteren inneholder ikke en elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the optional <xref uid="langword_csharp_Recipient" name="Recipient" href=""></xref> attribute in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den valgfrie <xref uid="langword_csharp_Recipient" name="Recipient" href=""> </xref> attributtet i XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: The `<Recipient>` attribute is an optional attribute that contains information about which recipient this encrypted key value is intended for.
trans-unit.target: Den `<Recipient>` valgfrie attributtet som inneholder informasjon om hvilke mottaker denne krypterte nøkkelverdien er ment for.

trans-unit.source: Its contents are application dependent.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet er programmer som er avhengig.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Recipient" name="Recipient" href=""></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer verdien for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Recipient" name="Recipient" href=""> </xref> attributtet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""> </xref> element i XML-kryptering.

trans-unit.source: The `<ReferenceList>` element is an optional element that contains pointers to data and keys encrypted using this key.
trans-unit.target: Den `<ReferenceList>` elementet er et valgfritt element som inneholder pekere til data og nøkler som er kryptert ved hjelp av denne nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: The reference list can contain multiple references to the `<EncryptedKey>`and `<EncryptedData>` elements using the `<KeyReference>` and `<DataReference>` elements respectively.
trans-unit.target: Referanselisten kan inneholde flere referanser til den `<EncryptedKey>`og `<EncryptedData>` elementer ved hjelp av den `<KeyReference>` og `<DataReference>` elementer henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object.
